name: Lucchini RS S.p.A.
goal: Lucchini RS Group is an international group headquartered in Italy which offers a diversified range of high-tech products and services, whose core business is the design and  manufacturing of high-end railway solutions and overhaul service. It operates through an Italian industrial holding company (Lucchini RS S.p.A.) and a network of several subsidiary companies in Europe, Africa, America and Asia. Lead by the ambition of manufacturing innovative products to meet peopleâ€™s needs, the strengths of the Group lie in its integrated production facilities and its commitment to principles of sustainability.
euInitiatives:
As a committed member, Lucchini RS has contributed to the papers issued by UNIFE, and more specifically to all papers published by ERWA, the UNIFE organ committed to the wheelset industry. See www.unife.com for more details on ERWA.
Also, Lucchini RS is part of the EXPERT GROUP ON THE COMPETITIVENESS OF THE RAIL SUPPLY INDUSTRY
